H

Hero - com.Leo.Game中的类
Hero abstract class There are two types of heroes, enemy heroes and user-controlled heroes.Both the user side and the enemy hero can fire bullets, which can change the path of walking, and change direction when encountering obstacles such as walls and game boundaries during walking, but not always holding obstacles.

bullet hit home If the bullet hits the enemy crystal, the enemy crystal's health is reduced by home.setLife(home.getLife()-10), while changing the bullet's survival status this.live = false If the enemy crystal health is less than or equal to 0home.getLife()<=0, then change the crystal survival statehome.setLive(false);
